subject: Doping (Sports)
Bribery and Kickbacks
Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Lamine Diack, a former International Association of Athletics Federations president, has been placed under criminal investigation on suspicion of taking more than $1 million in bribes from Russia.
snippet: Lamine Diack, a former International Association of Athletics Federations president, has been placed under criminal investigation on suspicion of taking more than $1 million in bribes from Russia.
